message.content:
cs.MA, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.GT 

The paper proposes a new targeted advertising policy for Wireless Service Providers (WSPs) via SMS or MMS, which involves optimization and allocation of ads to individual customers based on their location and time. This problem involves multiple aspects of computer science such as machine learning, information retrieval, data structures, game theory, and optimization. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.MA (Multiagent Systems) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval), followed by cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
